3: Pant... pant... Finally, there you are!
Hm? Did you need Nanami for something?
The leader says there are results from the investigation! Some scavengers found traces of Constructs, come with us!
Ah, okay! I'll just go tell Amy about this first!
Um, didn't you want to finish the mission quickly?
Amy... Amy still needs to scavenge with us, you both have missions to complete!
Just... wait until it's over, then you can talk it out, alright?
Mhm, you have a point! Nanami will wait until it's over then!
Jazroc tunnel, southern foundation pit. A scavenger saw a Construct there a few days ago.
The pit is connected to the surface, and so the viral density is higher than underground by a large margin. I can only have someone bring you near the entrance.
It's here! Ah, wait... I need to wear a helmet first!
Even though the detection signal's not working, Nanami still smells something fishy here!
Mhm... and it's a bit of a party... You better hurry back! And be careful!
